# hw_cook (Resource)

The skilled artisan who brings your sandwiches to life. This resource demonstrates how experience levels affect both cost and efficiency, teaching conditional logic and computed attributes based on skill tiers.

*Hands that craft with care,*
*Experience shapes each sandwich,*
*Artistry in motion.*



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `experience` (String) Experience level (junior, experienced, expert). Affects cost and efficiency.
- `name` (String) Name of the cook

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the cook

### Read-Only

- `cost` (Number) Daily cost in dollars (junior=$120/day, experienced=$160/day, expert=$200/day)
- `id` (String) Cook identifier
